column4: I'm not exactly sure what I want to do with Ubuntu yet.  Seems kind of a waste just to use it the same way I'd use XP
the only thing I need XP for is for Yahoo literati.  I can't get it to run reliably in Ubuntu
stupid Java
it's like scrabble.  I play with my ex-girlfriend/fiancee
yes
Anyway, sometimes it will load but soon after, it makes FF do a force quit
so, I have to switch over to XP just to play her
really annoying
yep, Intrepid
I even tried installing openJDK with no love
u try icedtea?
yes, I tried icedtea as well.  No joy there either
i hate java.  its even worse in fedora & suse.  but -- icedteam usually works for me
u load jre too???
let me check
I have Sun Java 6 run time and Sun Java 6.0 Plugin
that *should* work
mine has Java 1.7 JRE with icedtea
I'm going to look for other java based games and see what happens
cool.  then its the game...   my test is always: go to NYTimes site and try loading the classic crossword puzzl
I will try that next
logging off for the nite.  any luck with java?
